metadata.title: ooohyeah Men's Bob Ross Mr Bean Mr Rogers Novelty Crew Funny Crazy Fun Casual Dress Cotton Socks
features: [US Size scale as follows] Men's sock size 10-13, Fits men’s shoe size 8-13. One size fits most men.

[Comfortable & Breathable] Made from premium cotton, these socks are super soft and lightweight, allowing your feet to breathe and stay cool during strenuous activity. The thin, elastic edging around the opening ensures the sock lays flat against your feet and prevents them from sliding down, but not too tight.

[Long Lasting & High Quality] The high quality construction - 65%cotton,32%nylon,3%spandex gives these socks extra durability and flexibility during wear. For you, this means a pair of socks great for all day wear, no matter what you're up to.
[Idea Gift Choice] These high-quality and fun saying socks are the perfect funky gift for Bob Ross Fan, Crazy Socks Day, Valentine’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Anniversary, Graduation, etc.

[Wash & Care] Keep your socks looking their best for years to come. They can be washed by machine or by hand. Machine wash cold with no bleach and hang to dry. Tumble drying, ironing, and dry cleaning are not recommended.
description: For over a decade, we crafted premium socks using only the finest materials. Made with combed cotton don’t get little holes at the toe after you wear them a few times, nor do they lose their elasticity. Best of all, you can feel good about sharing this classics, novelty and fashion socks with your family and friends. Gift Idea for Mom, Wife, Daughter, Sister, Friend, Family, Aunt or Grandma, Birthday, Christmas, Anniversary. Suitable for sandals, flip flops, boots, sneakers, running shoes and dress or formal shoes These socks are fun, funny, cool, crazy, silly, novelty will keep your feet and toes warm all season long! Enjoy the cold weather comfortably and stylishly in these cool novelty socks. You can use these sat home, in your dorm, as a birthday or Christmas gift for friends or colleagues, in the office and in your bedroom. Stay safe and reduce the risk of falling, while also staying nice and warm doing it. Men's socks is comfortable, long lasting footwear can wear it outdoor for a walk in a cold day or to a beach. The holiday season is coming around and what better gift to give than a nice, warm pair of comfortable, soft and stylish Socks. The warm fleece lining and fun styles make a perfect gift for friend and loved ones. For Christmas, Thanksgiving, Father's day, Birthday and Graduation. These socks are made from soft, long-lasting combed cotton. It is elastic and comfortable make it suitable for your feet. Cotton allows a little more breathing room with regard to that humid environment, as opposed to synthetics, which sort of lock in the humidity, and more growth.
